title: Candelabrum
description: Cast and wrought; comprised of twelve arms and central shaft for a total of thirteen candle holders; the arms swivel round the center shaft so that they may be arranged in the same plane or at right angles to each other, forming a three-dimensional stylized tree
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
